# HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus

**Structure**

The possible home-access states.

## Declaration

```swift
struct HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus
```

## Overview

Inspect the home manager’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManager/authorizationStatus] property for one or more of the bits defined by [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus].

## Recognizing Status Values

- **determined**: The user has set the app’s level of access to home data.
- **authorized**: The app has access to home data.
- **restricted**: The app doesn’t have access to home data.

## Creating an Authorization Status

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an access status from a raw value.

## Inspecting authorization status

- **authorizationStatus**: The current state of the app’s access to home data.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
